amendment.description: An amendment numbered 89 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to implement Section 216 of Executive Order 14008 (86 Fed. Reg. 7627), relating to tackling the climate crisis at home and abroad.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fulcher amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 202 (Roll no. 581).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fulcher amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 202 (Roll no. 581).
